heroImage.h1_3: is your online presence. Make sure it is
heroImage.p: Elevate Your Business with Professional Web Development

about.aboutMeText_1: Hi, I'm Josu√© Cuevas, a passionate programmer dedicated to crafting exceptional digital businesses. +3 years as software developer. I believe in communication as well as in teamwork to achieve the best results. I thrive in dynamic environments where I can contribute my technical expertise while collaborating closely with clients, designers, and fellow developers.
about.aboutMeText_2: I specialize in creating responsive, user-friendly websites that not only look great but also deliver seamless functionality across all devices. My goal is to help businesses establish a strong online presence through innovative solutions that drive engagement and growth.

projects.title: COVA
projects.description: Web App with multiple functionalities for a real estate company, it generates personalized quotes for the client that can be downloaded or sent by e-mail and an administrator dashboard to manage project information.

projects.title: OaxaTech
projects.description: Full Stack project where I made the design, development and SEO for an e-commerce to sale mobile parts aimed to phones like displays and batteries, using Stripe as payment gateway

projects.title: My Weather
projects.description: Frontend project where I designed and developed a weather application to reaffirm advanced knowledge of React. Consuming the OpenWeatherMap API

projects.title: Sennse Buildings
projects.description: Full Stack project, I made the design and development of a database and an interface to monitor the availability of the apartments to sell, as well as an API to consume the data

projects.title: Quoter Sennse
projects.description: Full Stack project where I developed a quoter to calculate the price of an apartment in different payment schemes. The site also creates a PDF file that can be sent by email or downloaded.

services.h2_1: What can I do for you...
services.h2_2: By choosing my services, you can expect:

services.title: Front-end Development
services.description: Create visually appealing and user-friendly websites using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Craft engaging user interfaces that optimize the user experience and responsiveness across different devices

services.title: Back-end Development
services.description: Build robust and scalable server-side applications using frameworks like Express.js and Node. Develop secure databases and integrate APIs to ensure seamless functionality and data management.

services.title: Responsive Design
services.description: Ensure your website or application looks and performs flawlessly on various devices, including desktops, tablets, and mobile devices. Implement responsive design principles to provide a consistent and optimized experience for your users

services.title: E-commerce Solutions
services.description: Develop custom e-commerce websites with secure payment gateways, inventory management systems, and user-friendly interfaces. Enable your business to sell products or services online effectively

services.title: Web Application Development
services.description: Build dynamic and interactive web applications using modern frameworks like React.js. Implement complex functionality, real-time updates, and seamless user interactions.

benefits.title: Quality Craftsmanship
benefits.description: I take pride in delivering clean, well-structured code that adheres to industry best practices, ensuring your project is reliable, maintainable, and scalable.

benefits.title: Attention to Details
benefits.description: I pay close attention to your project requirements, ensuring every aspect is meticulously planned and executed to meet your objectives.

benefits.title: Collaborative Approach
benefits.description: I believe in open communication and collaboration throughout the development process, ensuring that your vision is translated into a successful digital solution.

benefits.title: Timely Delivery
benefits.description: I understand the importance of meeting deadlines. I strive to deliver projects within agreed timelines without compromising on quality.

benefits.title: Exceptional Support
benefits.description: Even after project completion, I provide ongoing support and assistance to address any concerns or updates you may require.

footer.text_1: Thank you for taking the time to explore my portfolio. I'm sure you found it informative and inspiring. If you have any questions or potential collaboration I will be happy to help you.
footer.text_2: Please feel free to contact us using the information provided above. Thank you once again, and I look forward to hearing from you soon.
